about_the_game:
A king under threat. A great power hangs in the balance. After uncovering a regicidal plot, the old Mage must leverage the forbidden power of mind/body dualism to cross dimensions, possess the bodies of others and ultimately foil the assassination plot on the King whom he serves.

Solve problems, overcome obstacles and explore to uncover the mystery in this arcade-style 2D puzzle-platformer.

Each level offers its own unique challenges, from tricky obstacles to exciting puzzles.

Will you make the right decisions and achieve a happy ending, or will your choices lead to a darker fate?

short_description: The Mage is a 2D puzzle platformer casual game that will transport you to a world of magic. Play as a powerful mage on a quest to save his King from a dark and malevolent force that threatens to destroy everything in its path.
